version_description:
Another major update :-)

Universal Binary support.

Smoothing and Strength slider have been combined into 1 slider and the app intelligently works out smoothing and strength based on the image.

There is now a Smoothing Brush included

3.79
Presets now show live preview using your selected image. This makes it much easier to see the one you would like to use.
